text: I was given an on-demand button to send morphine into my IV. Granted the amount was limited. But instead of using more during that week, I used LESS. I was released after 24 hrs off it & given a Rx for Vicoden. It made me nauseous so I stuck with Tylenol. NOT ADDICTED. /5
